TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23esdSELECT DISTINCT ah.account_id, ce.created FROM cdhub_error ce, account_hist ah WHERE to_number(ce.orion_entity_id) = ah.merged_into_account_id AND ah.wm_optype = 'D' AND ce.updated BETWEEN ah.actual_updated - 1/288 --minus 5 minutes AND ah.actual_updated + 1/4 --plus 6 hours AND ce.orion_entity_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.direction = 'orion to cdhub' AND ce.action_attempted = 'AccountMerge' AND upper(ce.error_thrown) LIKE '%NO ROW WITH THE GIVEN IDENTIFIER EXISTS: [COM.SAS.ORION.FRAMEWORK.ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTIMPL%'
